snippet: PRESENT--Daniel. Congregation Emanu-El of the City of New York records with deep sorrow the death of our cherished member, Dr. Daniel H. Present. It is our hope and prayer that beautiful memories will linger as a legacy to his life. 1/3
lead_paragraph: PRESENT--Daniel. Congregation Emanu-El of the City of New York records with deep sorrow the death of our cherished member, Dr. Daniel H. Present. It is our hope and prayer that beautiful memories will linger as a legacy to his life. 1/3
